content:
**Items [item(1)] - [item(3)]:**
$$passage
The lion king was sleeping peacefully. A mouse ran so mischievously that it accidentally climbed onto the lion's body. causing the lion to rouse and roar in anger. So he thrusted the mouse into his claws. The mouse was terrified and trembled. ready to beg for life and said If you let yourself go In the future may be able to help the lion. Even if the lion laughs but lets me go Later one day, the lion was hunting for prey and missed the huntsman's snare. No matter how hard you try to __squirm__, you won't be able to squirm. I heard the lion's cry and came to the rescue by biting the snare until it was broken. make the lion survive because of the help of a little mouse.
$$
